BiomeDef.label: kamino
BiomeDef.description: Kamino is an aquatic planet located in an extragalactic star system that straggled south of the Rishi Maze satellite galaxy and beyond the larger galaxy. [Ocean]

BiomeDef.label: kamino
BiomeDef.description: Kamino is an aquatic planet located in an extragalactic star system that straggled south of the Rishi Maze satellite galaxy and beyond the larger galaxy. [Lake]
